verses.verse: <S%G1899>Then<s%> <S%G1180>fourteen<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> <S%G1223>after<s%> I went <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas<s%>, and <S%G4838>took<s%> <S%G5103>Titus<s%> with me <S%G4838><s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> I went <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G2596>by<s%> <S%G602>revelation<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G394>communicated<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%> that <S%G2098>gospel<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2784>preach<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G2596>privately<s%> <S%G2398><s%> to them which were of <S%G1380>reputation<s%>, lest by any <S%G3381>means<s%> <S%G4458><s%> I should <S%G5143>run<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> had <S%G5143>run<s%>, <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G2756>vain<s%>. privately: or, severally

<S%G235>But<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G5103>Titus<s%>, <S%G3588>who<s%> was <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G1698>me<s%>, <S%G5607>being<s%> a <S%G1672>Greek<s%>, was <S%G315>compelled<s%> to be <S%G4059>circumcised<s%>:

<S%G1161>And<s%> that because <S%G1223>of<s%> false <S%G5569>brethren<s%> unawares brought <S%G3920>in<s%>, <S%G3748>who<s%> came in <S%G3922>privily<s%> to spy <S%G2684>out<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G1657>liberty<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> they might <S%G2615>bring<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> into <S%G2615>bondage<s%>:

To <S%G3739>whom<s%> we gave <S%G1502>place<s%> by <S%G5292>subjection<s%>, no, <S%G3761>not<s%> <S%G4314>for<s%> an <S%G5610>hour<s%>; <S%G2443>that<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> might <S%G1265>continue<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> these who <S%G1380>seemed<s%> to <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G5100>somewhat<s%>, <S%G3697>(whatsoever<s%> <S%G4218><s%> they <S%G2258>were<s%>, it <S%G1308>maketh<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G1308>matter<s%> to <S%G3427>me<s%>: <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2983>accepteth<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G444>man's<s%> <S%G4383>person<s%>:) <S%G1063>for<s%> they who <S%G1380>seemed<s%> to be somewhat in conference <S%G4323>added<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> to <S%G1698>me<s%>:

<S%G235>But<s%> <S%G5121>contrariwise<s%>, when they <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of the <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%> was committed unto <S%G4100>me<s%>, <S%G2531>as<s%> the gospel of the <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> was unto <S%G4074>Peter<s%>;

<S%G1063>(For<s%> he that wrought <S%G1754>effectually<s%> in <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G651>apostleship<s%> of the <S%G4061>circumcision<s%>, the <S%G2532>same<s%> was <S%G1754>mighty<s%> in <S%G1698>me<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%>:)

<S%G2532>And<s%> when <S%G2385>James<s%><S%G2532>,<s%> <S%G2786>Cephas<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%>, <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G1380>seemed<s%> to <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G4769>pillars<s%>, <S%G1097>perceived<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> that was <S%G1325>given<s%> unto <S%G3427>me<s%>, they <S%G1325>gave<s%> to <S%G1698>me<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> the right <S%G1188>hands<s%> of <S%G2842>fellowship<s%>; <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> should go <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G1484>heathen<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G4061>circumcision<s%>.

<S%G3440>Only<s%> they would <S%G2443>that<s%> we should <S%G3421>remember<s%> the <S%G4434>poor<s%>; the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G5124><s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G4704>I<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> was <S%G4704>forward<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> was <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G490>Antioch<s%>, I <S%G436>withstood<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G4383>face<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> he <S%G2258>was<s%> to be <S%G2607>blamed<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> that <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2385>James<s%>, he did <S%G4906>eat<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> they were <S%G2064>come<s%>, he <S%G5288>withdrew<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G873>separated<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%>, <S%G5399>fearing<s%> them which were <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4061>circumcision<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G3062>other<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G4942>dissembled<s%> <S%G2532>likewise<s%> with <S%G846>him<s%>; <S%G5620>insomuch<s%> that <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> was carried <S%G4879>away<s%> with <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G5272>dissimulation<s%>.

<S%G235>But<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> they <S%G3716>walked<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3716>uprightly<s%> according <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel<s%>, I <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> them <S%G3956>all<s%>, <S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%>, <S%G5225>being<s%> a <S%G2453>Jew<s%>, <S%G2198>livest<s%> after the manner of <S%G1483>Gentiles<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> as do the <S%G2452>Jews<s%>, <S%G5101>why<s%> compellest <S%G315>thou<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> to live as do the <S%G2450>Jews<s%>?
<S%G2249>We<s%> who are <S%G2453>Jews<s%> by <S%G5449>nature<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G268>sinners<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%>,

<S%G1492>Knowing<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1344>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G3362>but<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> have <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> we might be <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%>: <S%G1360>for<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G1344>shall<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> be <S%G1344>justified<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%>, while we <S%G2212>seek<s%> to be <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G2147>we<s%> <S%G846>ourselves<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> are <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G268>sinners<s%>, is <S%G687>therefore<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> the <S%G1249>minister<s%> of <S%G266>sin<s%>? God <S%G3361>forbid<s%> <S%G1096><s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> I <S%G3618>build<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> the <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2647>destroyed<s%>, I <S%G4921>make<s%> <S%G1683>myself<s%> a <S%G3848>transgressor<s%>.
<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> am <S%G599>dead<s%> to the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> I might <S%G2198>live<s%> unto <S%G2316>God<s%>.

I am <S%G4957>crucified<s%> with <S%G5547>Christ<s%>: <S%G1161>nevertheless<s%> I <S%G2198>live<s%>; yet <S%G3765>not<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2198>liveth<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1698>me<s%>: <S%G1161>and<s%> the life <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2198>I<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> I <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%> of the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3860>gave<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%>.

I <S%G114>do<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G114>frustrate<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> come <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G686>then<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is <S%G599>dead<s%> in <S%G1432>vain<s%>.
